analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/7/0xd86a85f5d68a4ade66cb66b8a6fa1ed3cb1cd6b4.sol:
	Contract CiceroToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0xd86a85f5d68a4ade66cb66b8a6fa1ed3cb1cd6b4.sol#93)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/7/0xd86a85f5d68a4ade66cb66b8a6fa1ed3cb1cd6b4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.17 (/unique_chucks/7/0xd86a85f5d68a4ade66cb66b8a6fa1ed3cb1cd6b4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_spender' of CiceroToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/7/0xd86a85f5d68a4ade66cb66b8a6fa1ed3cb1cd6b4.sol#188-189) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of CiceroToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/7/0xd86a85f5d68a4ade66cb66b8a6fa1ed3cb1cd6b4.sol#189) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of CiceroToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/7/0xd86a85f5d68a4ade66cb66b8a6fa1ed3cb1cd6b4.sol#208-209) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_subtractedValue' of CiceroToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/7/0xd86a85f5d68a4ade66cb66b8a6fa1ed3cb1cd6b4.sol#209) is not in mixedCase
